cifField.name: data item size
cifField.descript: Number of bits per data item (less 1)

cifField.name: item packing field size
cifField.descript: Number of bit in packing field (less 1)

cifField.name: data item fractional size
cifField.descript: Number of fractional bits for non-normalized ufixed-point formats

cifField.name: channel tag item size
cifField.descript: Number of bits in channel tag

cifField.name: event tag size
cifField.descript: Number of bits in event tag

cifField.name: sample repeat
cifField.descript: Sample repeating is used

cifField.name: data item format
cifField.descript: Type of data contained in packet

cifField.name: real
cifField.descript: Real or Complex data

cifField.name: packing method
cifField.descript: Data arranged in link-efficient format

cifField.name: vector size
cifField.descript: Vector count of packet (less 1)

cifField.name: repeat count
cifField.descript: Channel or sample component repeating count (less 1)

cifField.name: user
cifField.descript: User defined indicator fields

cifField.name: user flag 0
cifField.descript: User defined indicator bit

cifField.name: user flag 1
cifField.descript: User defined indicator bit

cifField.name: sample frame
cifField.descript: Position of packet within frame (V49.2 feature)

cifField.name: sample loss
cifField.descript: At least one time discontinuity contained in data packet

cifField.name: over-range
cifField.descript: At least one sample in data packet exceeds representable range

cifField.name: spectral inversion
cifField.descript: Data packets signal is spectrally inverted with respect to the reference point

cifField.name: detected signal
cifField.descript: Data packets contain signal of interest

cifField.name: agc-mgc
cifField.descript: Automatic gain control is active

cifField.name: reference lock
cifField.descript: All PLLs impacting the data are locked

cifField.name: valid
cifField.descript: Data packet contains valid data

cifField.name: calibrated time
cifField.descript: Data packet timestamp is calibrated to external reference

cifField.name: user flag 0
cifField.descript: User flag 0 indicator enable

cifField.name: user flag 1
cifField.descript: User flag 1 indicator enable

cifField.name: sample frame enable 0
cifField.descript: Frame indicator enable

cifField.name: sample frame enable 1
cifField.descript: Redundant frame indicator enable (should match bit 22)

cifField.name: sample loss enable
cifField.descript: Sample loss indicator enable

cifField.name: over-range enable
cifField.descript: Over-range Indicator enable

cifField.name: spectral inversion enable
cifField.descript: Spectral inversion indicator enable

cifField.name: detected signal enable
cifField.descript: Detected signal indicator enable

cifField.name: agc-mgc enable
cifField.descript: Automatic/manual gain control indicator enable

cifField.name: reference lock enable
cifField.descript: Reference lock indicator enable

cifField.name: valid enable
cifField.descript: Valid indicator enable

cifField.name: calibrated time enable
cifField.descript: Calibrated time indicator enable

cifField.name: Manufacturer OUI
cifField.descript: IEEE-registered Organizationally Unique Identifier of device manufacturer

cifField.name: Device Code
cifField.descript: Device model

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Temperature of device

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Time at which timestamp was known to be accurate (unformatted)

info.string: Interpret timestamp based on packet TSI setting.

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Delay between timestamp of data packet and reference point

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Sample rate of paired data packets

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Number of over-range samples in associated data packet

cifField.name: stage1
cifField.descript: Front-end/IF (or total, if stage 2 does not apply) gain relative to reference point

cifField.name: stage2
cifField.descript: Back-end/RF gain relative to reference

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: AC power of unit scale sinusoid at reference point

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Additional offset of center of band to IF Reference Frequency

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Additional RF frequency delta of signal at reference point

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Original RF frequency of signal at reference point

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Center of band of signal after translation

cifField.name: bandwidth
cifField.descript: Usable spectrum at output of reference point

cifField.name: Identifier
cifField.descript: Stream id assigned of timestamp reference point

cifField.name: Buffer Size
cifField.descript: Number of bytes buffer can hold

cifField.name: Status
cifField.descript: Buffer status (see documentation for interpretation)

cifField.name: Level
cifField.descript: Current level of buffer

cifField.name: User
cifField.descript: User defined version code

cifField.name: Revision
cifField.descript: Version on given day/year

cifField.name: Day
cifField.descript: Day of year from 1 = Jan 1

cifField.name: Year
cifField.descript: Build Year relative to 2000

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: V49 Standard and Specification Compliance Number

cifField.name: Identifier
cifField.descript: Health and Status Information (see documentation)

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Discrete IO (see documentation)

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Discrete IO (see documentation)

cifField.name: list
cifField.descript: List of record indices to act on

cifField.name: array
cifField.descript: Descriptor array to set up scan/step

cifField.name: spectrum type
cifField.descript: Type of spectral data

cifField.name: linear averaging
cifField.descript: Apply linear averaging

cifField.name: peak-hold
cifField.descript: Select maximum value in window

cifField.name: min-hold
cifField.descript: Select minimum value in window

cifField.name: exponential averaging
cifField.descript: Apply exponential averaging

cifField.name: median averaging
cifField.descript: Select the median value in the window

cifField.name: smoothing
cifField.descript: Apply averaging within sample frame

cifField.name: window time delta type
cifField.descript: Format of window time delta field

cifField.name: window type
cifField.descript: Type of window applied in time domain before transform

cifField.name: number of transform points
cifField.descript: Number of points in the spectral transform

cifField.name: number of window points
cifField.descript: Number of in the spectral transform window

cifField.name: resolution
cifField.descript: Resolution of spectral points

cifField.name: span
cifField.descript: Overall bandwidth of spectral data

cifField.name: number of averages
cifField.descript: Extent of smoothing on data; exact meaning depends on averaging type

cifField.name: weighting factor
cifField.descript: Coefficient for nonlinear averaging

cifField.name: spectrum F1 indices
cifField.descript: First frequency bin of transform results transmitted

cifField.name: spectrum F2 indices
cifField.descript: Last frequency bin of transform results transmitted

cifField.name: window time delta
cifField.descript: Overlap between spectral transforms (time in ns, samples, or % overlap)

cifField.name: array
cifField.descript: Array of CIFs (no decoding available).

cifField.name: bandwidth
cifField.descript: Alternate usable spectrum at output of reference point

cifField.name: stage1
cifField.descript: Alternate front-end/IF (or total, if stage 2 does not apply) gain relative to reference point

cifField.name: stage2
cifField.descript: Alternate back-end/RF gain relative to reference

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Alternate frequency of signal at reference point

cifField.name: noise figure
cifField.descript: Noise figure at reference point

cifField.name: SNR
cifField.descript: Signal-to-noise ratio at reference point

cifField.name: third order intercept
cifField.descript: Third order input intercept point at reference point

cifField.name: second order intercept
cifField.descript: Second order input intercept point at reference point

cifField.name: one dB compression point
cifField.descript: 1 dB Compression point at reference point

cifField.name: stage1
cifField.descript: Signal level at reference point at which primary action should be taken

cifField.name: stage2
cifField.descript: Signal level at reference point at which secondary action should be taken

cifField.name: BER
cifField.descript: Bit error rate at reference point

cifField.name: EbN0
cifField.descript: Energy per bit to noise power bandwidth ratio at reference point

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Distance from reference point (target defined by class)

cifField.name: vertical
cifField.descript: Vertical 3 dB width of main lobe at reference point

cifField.name: horizontal
cifField.descript: Horizontal 3 dB width of main lobe at reference point

cifField.name: identifier
cifField.descript: User defined identifier of antenna scan pattern

cifField.name: spatial identifier
cifField.descript: User defined identifier for spatial reference

cifField.name: array
cifField.descript: Array of pointing vectors (no decoding available).

cifField.name: azimuth
cifField.descript: Azimuth angle measured clockwise from compass north

cifField.name: elevation
cifField.descript: Elevation angle relative to reference with positive toward zenith

cifField.name: azimuth
cifField.descript: Azimuth angle measured clockwise from compass north

cifField.name: elevation
cifField.descript: Elevation angle relative to reference with positive toward zenith

cifField.name: ellipticity
cifField.descript: Ellipticity angle describing the antenna polarization

cifField.name: tilt
cifField.descript: Tilt (inclination) angle describing the antenna polarization

cifField.name: phase offset
cifField.descript: Phase difference of described signal at reference point

cifField.descript: Tag describing antenna geographical footprint, linked to KLM record

cifField.descript: Tag describing antenna geographical footprint, linked to KLM record

cifField.descript: Tag to indicate relative priority of information

cifField.descript: Tag to indicate relative priority of function on multi-fucntion device

cifField.descript: Tag to associate stream to modulation by type

cifField.descript: Tag to associate stream to platform by instance

cifField.descript: Tag to associate stream to platform by class

cifField.descript: Operator identifier

cifField.descript: User defined or ISO 3166 numeric code for country

cifField.name: ISO 3166 enable
cifField.descript: Id is a ISO 3166 numeric code

cifField.name: id
cifField.descript: Tag used to identify a common set of information

cifField.name: id
cifField.descript: Id of information source used to define other ids

cifField.name: id
cifField.descript: Controller UUID associated with information in this packet

cifField.descript: Controller ID associated with information in this packet

cifField.descript: Controlee UUID associated with information in this packet

cifField.descript: Stream id of component sourcing information to this one

cifField.name: id

cifField.descript: Identifiers at the same packet structure level are bonded to one another

cifField.name: id
cifField.descript: Tag to associate information to a specific network

cifField.descript: Standardized description of swell conditions

cifField.descript: Ambient humidity relative to 100%

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Ambient surface temperature at platform

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Ambient temperature of air at platform

cifField.name: integer
cifField.descript: Timestamp at which current state will expire

info.string: Field size based on packet TSI/TSF settings which are not available to CIF dissector. Remaining packet may be misaligned.

cifField.name: integer
cifField.descript: Timestamp at which current state became valid

info.string: Field size based on packet TSI/TSF settings which are not available to CIF dissector. Remaining packet may be misaligned.

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Uncertainty of time measurements (+/-)

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Time over which signal exists

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Time over which expected pattern exists

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Time interval of one cycle of cyclic behavior

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Time between two alternate edges of the signal

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Latency between packet timestamp and timing edge configuration became valid

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Time for signal to fall from 90% to 10% relative to noise floor

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Time for signal to rise from 10% to 90% relative to noise floor

cifField.name: value
cifField.descript: Time offset between this signal and adjacent signal as indicated by sibling SID

cifField.name: POSIX time offset
cifField.descript: Time difference between UTC time and POSIX time (sum of leap seconds)

cifField.name: POSIX offset enable
cifField.descript: Posix time offset is valid

cifField.name: time source
cifField.descript: Description of timing reference device

cifField.name: leap second present code
cifField.descript: Number of seconds in current day

cifField.name: leap second handling code
cifField.descript: Indicate how lead seconds are handled

cifField.name: timestamp epoch code
cifField.descript: Reference point for timestamp epoch offset below

cifField.name: global time source
cifField.descript: Timestamp details apply globally to stream id, not just for paired data

cifField.name: user
cifField.descript: User defined timestamp details field

cifField.name: timestamp epoch offset
cifField.descript: Start of timestamp epoch after referenced epoch

info.string: CIF_ENABLE[4] is not defined in spec.
CIF_ENABLE[5] is not defined in spec.
CIF_ENABLE[6] is not defined in spec.
Dissector Does not support redefinition of field format (CIF7). All fields are probably wrong.
